metadata.title: CVE-2024-44988 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net: dsa: mv88e6xxx: Fix out-of-bound accessIf an ATU violation was caused by a CPU Load operation, the SPID couldbe larger than DSA_MAX_PORTS (the size of mv88e6xxx_chip.ports[] array).

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
